pr_title: Elide 5: Sketch out support for nested query plans.

timeline.message: added query plan to Metric formula
Added monthly time grain to playerStats test table
Made query plan queryable.  Added query resolver test
Added withSource methods to do proper conversions of projections
Fixed issue with query symbol resolution.  QueryPlanResolver now sources projections directly from the SQL table.
Added new dynamic sql reference resolver which avoids copying all the static lookups for each query.

timeline.bodyText: This could be written as if (!invoked)
timeline.author: moizarafat
